meanings.sent1: The unquoted text stood out on the page.
meanings.sent2: She preferred to leave her dialogue unquoted in the story.
meanings.sent3: The unquoted words seemed to dance freely on the paper.
meanings.sent4: Her unquoted thoughts were like colorful balloons floating in the sky.
meanings.sent5: The unquoted phrases popped off the page, demanding attention.

meanings.definition: Not mentioned or cited in a quotation.
meanings.sent1: The unquoted details added depth to the story.
meanings.sent2: He intentionally left some information unquoted in his speech.
meanings.sent3: The unquoted facts whispered secrets to those who paid attention.
meanings.sent4: Her unquoted memories lingered in the corners of her mind.
meanings.sent5: The unquoted names echoed in the silence of the room.

meanings.definition: Not given a price or value in a financial market.
meanings.sent2: Investors were cautious about the unquoted shares.
meanings.sent3: The unquoted assets seemed to mock the analysts.
meanings.sent4: His unquoted investments were like hidden treasures waiting to be discovered.
meanings.sent5: The unquoted values remained a mystery to many.
